Package model

Class Show

java.lang.Object
model.Show
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Show extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a showing of a movie.
Since:
2022-10-30
Version:
3.0
Author:
Guo Sihan, Davyn Yam JunHao, Wang Yu Teng, Aditya Pugalia, Ng Yong Jian
See Also:

      public boolean checkOccupied(String seatIndex)
      A function to check if a specific seat is currently already occupied.
      Parameters:
      seatIndex - The index of the seat to be checked.
      Returns:
      Returns a boolean value, true meaning the seat is occupied and false meaning otherwise.
